title: How Many Rhymes?
description: How Many Rhymes? is a rhyming, repetitive book containing an assortment of silly, fun rhymes. Readers are asked to count the rhymes as they read. Whimsical illustrations support the text.
reviewWords: bog, calf, dozen, fancy, lame, nag, rhymes, wig
comprehension: Reality and Fantasy                : Identify fantasy and reality
awareness: Manipulate Initial Sound                : Manipulate initial sounds
phonics: Open Vowels : Read words with open vowel y
grammar: Adjectives                : Recognize and understand how to use adjectives
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
